Articles.Content:
I just started a save where I build weapons using sutff like BDarmory and plane plus. I recently made a UAV predetor drone which wouldn't take off. I wondered why and after a while I check the center of lift, and it appeared to be below the aircraft and underground. I dont think this is an issue with mods because my friends who also play say they have the same problem and are saying its just the latest update. If anyone knows what its from or how to fix it It would be very helpful

Edited August 21, 2018 by More_Heat_Shields

I've built planes where the center of lift was displayed as just a blue circle with no arrows....no idea what caused it....

Throwing away the build and starting over seemed to fix it....

It's happened to me on more than one occasion....

It may have happened once because I switched to the SPH from the VAB with the button in the VAB....

Edited August 22, 2018 by JoE Smash
If it is from the latest update, try recreating it in a stock game.  Then we can open a bug tracker and get the devs to fix it.
